text: Pope Urban may mean: *Pope Urban I (c. 222–230), a saint of the Roman Catholic Church *Pope Urban II (1088–1099) *Pope Urban III (1185–1187) *Pope Urban IV (1261–1264) *Pope Urban V (1362–1370) *Pope Urban VI (1378–1389) *Pope Urban VII (1590), the shortest papacy *Pope Urban VIII (1623–1644) Urban
title: Pope Urban
